SQL_STMT_U.val: select COUNT(ItemCode) from OITM (nolock) T0 left join OITB T1 on T0.ItmsGrpCod=T1.ItmsGrpCod WHERE (T0.ItemCode = ':1' OR ':1' is null or ':1' = '') and (ISNULL(T0.ItemName,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':2','')+'%') and (T0.ItemType = ':3' OR ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and (T0.ItmsGrpCod = :4 OR :4 is null or :4 = 0)

select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by T0.Itemcode) as 'No', T0.ItemCode, T0.ItemName, CASE WHEN T0.ItemType = 'F' THEN 'Fixed Assets' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'I' THEN 'Items' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'L' THEN 'Labor' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'T' THEN 'Travel' END as 'Item Type', T1.ItmsGrpNam as 'Item Group', CASE WHEN GLMethod = 'L' THEN 'Item' WHEN GLMethod = 'W' THEN 'Warehouse' WHEN GLMethod = 'C' THEN 'Group' END AS 'GLMethod', T0.OnHand as 'Stock', T0.ExpensAcct as 'Inventory Account', T0.ExmptIncom as 'Intermediary Account ', T0.ECInAcct as 'Revenue RJ', T0.ECExpAcc as 'Revenue RI', T0.FrgnInAcct as 'COGS', T0.FrgnName as 'DH Code', CASE WHEN T0.ItemType = 'I' THEN T0.AvgPrice WHEN T0.ItemType = 'F' THEN T8.TotalValue ELSE 0 END as ItemValue, IIF(ISNULL(T0.ValidFor, 'N') = 'Y', 'Active', 'Inactive') as ItemStatus from OITM (nolock) T0 left join OITB T1 (nolock) on T0.ItmsGrpCod=T1.ItmsGrpCod left join ( select itemcode, sum(apc) TotalValue from itm8 (nolock) group by itemcode ) T8 on T0.ItemCode = T8.ItemCode WHERE 1=1 :1 :2 :3 :4 :5

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,55}) OR Trim({0,55}) = '', '', ' and (T0.ItemCode = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,55}) & ASCIIChr(39) &')' )
IF(ISNULL({0,56}) OR Trim({0,56}) = '', '', ' and (ISNULL(T0.ItemName,'''') like ' & ASCIIChr(39) & '%' & Trim({0,56}) & '%' & ASCIIChr(39) & ')' )
IF(ISNULL({0,106}) OR Trim({0,106}) = '', '', ' and (T0.ItemType = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,106}) & ASCIIChr(39) & ')' )
IF(ISNULL({0,129}) OR Trim({0,129}) = '', '', ' and (T0.ValidFor = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,129}) & ASCIIChr(39) & ')' )

DataViewToText(0, 'No,Item Code,'&IF({32768,118}='RS','DH Code,','')&'Item Name,Item Type,Item Group,Status,GL Method,Stock,Item Value,Inventory Account,Intermediary Account,Revenue RI,Revenue RJ,COGS', '@', {32768,84}, ';', '"', 0 )

SQL_STMT_U.val: select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by T0.Itemcode) as 'No', T0.ItemCode, T0.ItemName, CASE WHEN T0.ItemType = 'F' THEN 'Fixed Assets' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'I' THEN 'Items' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'L' THEN 'Labor' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'T' THEN 'Travel' END as 'Item Type', T1.ItmsGrpNam as 'Item Group', CASE WHEN GLMethod = 'L' THEN 'Item' WHEN GLMethod = 'W' THEN 'Warehouse' WHEN GLMethod = 'C' THEN 'Group' END AS 'GLMethod', T0.OnHand as 'Stock', T0.ExpensAcct as 'Inventory Account', T0.ExmptIncom as 'Intermediary Account ', T0.ECInAcct as 'Revenue RJ', T0.ECExpAcc as 'Revenue RI', T0.FrgnInAcct as 'COGS', T0.FrgnName as 'DH Code', CASE WHEN T0.ItemType = 'I' THEN T0.AvgPrice WHEN T0.ItemType = 'F' THEN T8.TotalValue ELSE 0 END as ItemValue from OITM (nolock) T0 left join OITB T1 on T0.ItmsGrpCod=T1.ItmsGrpCod left join ( select itemcode, sum(apc) TotalValue from itm8 group by itemcode ) T8 on T0.ItemCode = T8.ItemCode WHERE 1=1 :1 :2 :3 :4

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,55}) OR Trim({0,55}) = '', '', ' and (T0.ItemCode = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,55}) & ASCIIChr(39) &')' )
IF(ISNULL({0,56}) OR Trim({0,56}) = '', '', ' and (ISNULL(T0.ItemName,'''') like ' & ASCIIChr(39) & '%' & Trim({0,56}) & '%' & ASCIIChr(39) & ')' )
IF(ISNULL({0,106}) OR Trim({0,106}) = '', '', ' and (T0.ItemType = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,106}) & ASCIIChr(39) & ')' )

DataViewToText(0, 'No,Item Code,'&IF({32768,118}='RS','DH Code,','')&'Item Name,Item Type,Item Group,GL Method,Stock,Item Value,Inventory Account,Intermediary Account,Revenue RI,Revenue RJ,COGS', '@', {32768,84}, ';', '"', 0 )

SQL_STMT_U.val: select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Itemcode) as 'No', ItemCode,ItemName,CASE WHEN T0.ItemType = 'F' THEN 'Fixed Assets' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'I' THEN 'Items' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'L' THEN 'Labor' WHEN T0.ItemType = 'T' THEN 'Travel' END as 'Item Type', T1.ItmsGrpNam as 'Item Group', CASE WHEN GLMethod = 'L' THEN 'Item' WHEN GLMethod = 'W' THEN 'Warehouse' WHEN GLMethod = 'C' THEN 'Group' END AS 'GLMethod', OnHand as 'Stock', ExpensAcct as 'Inventory Account', T0.ExmptIncom as 'Intermediary Account ', ECInAcct as 'Revenue RJ', ECExpAcc as 'Revenue RI', FrgnInAcct as 'COGS', FrgnName as 'DH Code' from OITM (nolock) T0 left join OITB T1 on T0.ItmsGrpCod=T1.ItmsGrpCod WHERE (T0.ItemCode = ':1' OR ':1' is null or ':1' = '') and (ISNULL(T0.ItemName,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':2','')+'%') and (T0.ItemType = ':3' OR ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and (T0.ItmsGrpCod = :4 OR :4 is null or :4 = 0)

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'No,Item Code,'&IF({32768,118}='RS','DH Code,','')&'Item Name,Item Type,Item Group,GL Method,Stock,Inventory Account,Intermediary Account,Revenue RI,Revenue RJ,COGS','@',{32768,84},';','"',0)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select T0.ItemCode as 'Item Code', T0.ItemName as 'Item Name', T1.ItmsGrpNam as 'Item Group', T0.ItemType as 'Item Type', --F=Fixed Asset,I=Item,L=Labor,T=Travel T0.InvntItem as 'Inventory Item', -- Y=Yes, N=No T0.OnHand as 'Stock', T0.InvntryUom as 'Inventory UoM', T2.uomname as 'Purchase UoM', T3.UomName as 'Sales UoM' from OITM T0 (nolock) left join OITB T1 (nolock) on T0.ItmsGrpCod=T1.ItmsGrpCod left join OUOM T2 (nolock) on T0.PUoMEntry=T2.UomEntry left join OUOM T3 (nolock) on T0.SUoMEntry=T3.UomEntry WHERE (T0.ItemCode = ':1' OR ':1' is null or ':1' = '') and (ISNULL(T0.ItemName,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':2','')+'%') and (T0.ItemType = ':3' OR ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and (T0.ItmsGrpCod = :4 OR :4 is null or :4 = 0)
